title: See You Again (feat. Charlie Puth)
author: Wiz Khalifa
lyrics:
[00:10.83] It's been a long day without you, my friend
[00:17.74] And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:23.54] We've come a long way from where we began
[00:29.42] Oh, I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:35.37] When I see you again
[00:40.28] Damn, who knew?
[00:41.70] All the planes we flew, good things we been through
[00:45.04] That I'd be standing right here talking to you
[00:47.70] 'Bout another path, I know we loved to hit the road and laugh
[00:51.37] But something told me that it wouldn't last
[00:53.76] Had to switch up, look at things different, see the bigger picture
[00:57.57] Those were the days, hard work forever pays
[01:00.57] Now I see you in a better place (see you in a better place)
[01:04.23] Uh
[01:05.30] How can we not talk about family when family's all that we got?
[01:08.93] Everything I went through, you were standing there by my side
[01:11.90] And now you gon' be with me for the last ride
[01:14.22] It's been a long day without you, my friend
[01:20.73] And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again (I'll see you again)
[01:26.54] We've come a long way (yeah, we came a long way)
[01:29.94] From where we began (you know we started)
[01:32.41] Oh, I'll tell you all about it when I see you again (I'll tell you)
[01:38.36] When I see you again
[01:42.86] 
[01:56.48] First, you both go out your way and the vibe is feeling strong
[01:59.66] And what's small turned to a friendship, a friendship turned to a bond
[02:02.69] And that bond will never be broken, the love will never get lost
[02:05.97] (The love will never get lost)
[02:08.55] And when brotherhood come first, then the line will never be crossed
[02:11.78] Established it on our own when that line had to be drawn
[02:14.64] And that line is what we reached, so remember me when I'm gone
[02:17.82] (Remember me when I'm gone)
[02:20.32] How can we not talk about family when family's all that we got?
[02:23.98] Everything I went through you were standing there by my side
[02:26.97] And now you gon' be with me for the last ride
[02:29.24] So let the light guide your way, yeah
[02:36.47] Hold every memory as you go
[02:41.55] And every road you take
[02:44.94] Will always lead you home, home
[02:52.80] It's been a long day without you, my friend
[02:59.76] And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[03:05.51] We've come a long way from where we began
[03:11.47] Oh, I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[03:17.33] When I see you again
[03:24.69] 
[03:29.38] When I see you again (yeah, uh)
[03:31.81] See you again (yeah, yeah, yeah)
[03:41.24] When I see you again
[03:43.98]
